I don't know what the fuck are traveling for fun a comedian called papa in a segment we call our ... in America Tom are you there
I'm here Chris I'm half of life I'm here I'm resuming my journey across the country sharing with good stories of our fellow Americans
This week I was lucky enough to experience the iconic New York autumn as I rolled in
Something magical about fall in Manhattan It's that sweet spot between the summer humidity and the icy winter when you can actually walk around town feel good and things don't smell so bad
It was late afternoon when I checked into my hotel and dropped off my bags New York is a great walking city and nothing encourages that more than a hotel room the size of a pine cone [noise]
The streets were colorful as always and Halloween has hit the city have you ever complimented someone's costume and realized he was just a New Yorker whereas a milk carton as a hat
I walked into Washington Square park and sat on a bench near a dog run there's nothing crazier than in New York dog park these are not dogs that are used to the freedom of backyards and rolling hills these are pets
That have been locked indoors for hours drinking coffee trying not to be on the New York post
When they finally get to the dog park they lose their minds
I sat next to one of the dog owners musician named Dave even though he was in sweat pants has long hair and cool Jean jacket said he was a rocker
His dog look cool to he was a mutt named Rocco with a spike collar and an upper lip and permanence ... David lived in the village with Rocco his whole adult life and makes a living now is a studio musician he was lamenting about how the city has changed
There's no scene for the young bands anymore than New York used to be a city of artists weirdos who are too strange to live in their hometowns but now there's nothing left at the weirdos can afford and
He said the one thing that will never change is the amazing diversity in the city there are people from all around the world he said just look at this dog park Rocco just a crazy mud and here he is hanging with three pug a purebred German Shepherd and the French
Poodle who's getting a little too friendly with or knows
This is New York
After meeting some friends for dinner I headed back towards the hotel through the west village on a normal night's this area's hopping but as Halloween comes near it's truly outrageous
But bars were in full force and people were dressed up in costumes roaming the streets to me it's the adults in costumes or the scariest part of Halloween at least when a child dresses up like a ninja turtle chances are he won't be drunk and hitting on your girlfriend [noise]
And they headed down McDougal street I was approached by what can only be described as a large dirty humor his face paint smudge is had had a muddy footprint on it he was sweating and confused
He grabbed my arm and asked if I knew where his friends where I felt bad for the summer but I had to laugh
What kinds of friends was looking for
Where they merged two [noise]
Did they live in a magical land should I Try and return them to his hollowed out tree
[laughter] I felt bad for him so he took his big white hand in mine and walking down the street
